lead_paragraph: Facing a political crisis that has led to mass demonstrations and calls for his resignation, President Otto Pérez Molina dismissed Interior Minister Mauricio López Bonilla, a top-ranking member of the governing party.

headline.main: Guatemalan President Dismisses a Close Aide

snippet: Facing a political crisis that has led to mass demonstrations and calls for his resignation, President Otto Pérez Molina dismissed Interior Minister Mauricio López Bonilla, a top-ranking member of the governing party.
abstract: Guatemalan Pres Otto Perez Molina dismisses three ministers from his cabinet, including his former campaign chief, Interior Min Mauricio Lopez Bonilla, in effort to restore public's faith in government ruined by allegations of corruption in Customs and Social Security departments.
